item.description:
Rennyo wrote, "Little did I know that I would grow old before I was aware of it..." This talk/discussion will look into the teaching of impermanance and the Five Remembrances. Based on Rennyo Shonin's letter "On a Hymn in Three Verses" written in 1477. Presented by Kisen. In addition, in celebration Mother's Day, a reflection of gratitude to our mothers will be read.

 

Visit our main website  at www.bffct.net for Calendar and more information on our beliefs and practices.

 

p.s. REMINDER - Hosted by the Buddhist Faith Fellowship. Even though just one or two people from Meetup have RSVPed, you can expect 35 - 45 people in attendance.
